Package Controllers

Class SignInController

java.lang.Object
Controllers.SignInController
public class SignInController
extends java.lang.Object

The class SignInController is used to control the sign in page

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      initialize the controller

      add listeners to relative text fields and bind relative labels to set notice information

      date
      20/01/2021-20:28

    • signIn

      public void signIn() throws java.sql.SQLException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException, java.io.IOException
      start sign in when clicking the button

      connect to database, verify the user information and then turn to main menu if succeed when clicking the 'Sign In' button

      Throws:
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - throws exception if cannot connect to the database
      java.sql.SQLException - throws exception if sql operations failed
      java.io.IOException - IOException
      date
      12/01/2021-15:08

    • inputVerify

      public void inputVerify​(javafx.scene.control.TextField input, javafx.beans.property.StringProperty noticeField, InputField field)
      Verifying if input satisfied the format requirement

      If not, give error information

      Parameters:
      input - relative text field
      noticeField - relative field for noticing user
      field - relative input field object
      date
      18/01/2021-16:05
